amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Black Lung Clinics Program by $2 million and decreases HHS congressional, public affairs, and intergovernmental affairs activities accordingly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds appropriated in the bill for the Black Lung Disability Trust Fund by $2 million and to reduce funds appropriated for in the bill for Congressional and legislative affairs, public affairs, and intergovernmental affairs activities comensurately.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ney amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
